text: Fantastic gaming laptop for the price. Getting amazing FPS in Cyberpunk 2077 and Valorant. The build quality of the Lenovo IdeaPad 330 81FK009TUS 15.6" Intel Core i7 8th Gen 8750H (2.20 GHz) NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1050 4 GB, 16 GB DDR4 Memory, 16 GB Optane Memory, 1 TB HDD, Windows 10 Home 64-Bit Gaming Laptop is solid, and the keyboard is a joy to use. A definite 5 stars!

Fantastic gaming laptop for the price. Getting amazing FPS in Call of Duty: Warzone and Valorant. The build quality of the Lenovo IdeaPad 330 81FK009TUS 15.6" Intel Core i7 8th Gen 8750H (2.20 GHz) NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1050 4 GB, 16 GB DDR4 Memory, 16 GB Optane Memory, 1 TB HDD, Windows 10 Home 64-Bit Gaming Laptop is solid, and the keyboard is a joy to use. A definite 5 stars!

Fantastic gaming laptop for the price. Getting amazing FPS in Call of Duty: Warzone and Starfield. The build quality of the Lenovo IdeaPad 330 81FK009TUS 15.6" Intel Core i7 8th Gen 8750H (2.20 GHz) NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1050 4 GB, 16 GB DDR4 Memory, 16 GB Optane Memory, 1 TB HDD, Windows 10 Home 64-Bit Gaming Laptop is solid, and the fan noise is a joy to use. A definite 5 stars!

Exceeded my expectations! Perfect for streaming games. The NVIDIA GTX 1050 in the Lenovo IdeaPad 330 81FK009TUS 15.6" Intel Core i7 8th Gen 8750H (2.20 GHz) NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1050 4 GB, 16 GB DDR4 Memory, 16 GB Optane Memory, 1 TB HDD, Windows 10 Home 64-Bit Gaming Laptop is a powerhouse. Battery life is decent for a gaming laptop too. Very satisfied with this purchase.

Absolutely love this laptop! The performance for streaming games is incredible, especially the NVIDIA GTX 1050. Boots up super fast and handles everything I throw at it. The port selection is also top-notch. Highly recommend for anyone looking for a beast like the Lenovo IdeaPad 330 81FK009TUS 15.6" Intel Core i7 8th Gen 8750H (2.20 GHz) NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1050 4 GB, 16 GB DDR4 Memory, 16 GB Optane Memory, 1 TB HDD, Windows 10 Home 64-Bit Gaming Laptop!
